verbs.description: [ARG0: Clinton] [V: delivered] [ARG1: a critique of Republican President Donald Trump 's administration] , [ARGM-ADV: although she never mentioned Trump by name] .
Clinton delivered a critique of Republican President Donald Trump 's administration , although [ARG0: she] [ARGM-TMP: never] [V: mentioned] [ARG1: Trump] [ARGM-MNR: by name] .
